articles.title: US, Europe, UK report severe cases of hepatitis among children - WION
articles.description: Reports say the UK has detected severe cases of hepatitis among children including in the US and Europe.
articles.content:
Reports say the UK has detected severe cases of hepatitis among children including in the US and Europe.
Ireland and Spain have also reported acute hepatitis cases in children, the World Health Orga… [+1639 chars]

articles.title: Karim Benzema's last-gasp winner completes stunning Real Madrid comeback against Sevilla - European round-up - Sky Sports
articles.description: Karim Benzema's last-gasp winner sealed Real Madrid's stunning comeback as they recovered from 2-0 down to beat Sevilla 3-2.
articles.content:
Karim Benzema's last-gasp winner sealed Real Madrid's stunning comeback as they recovered from 2-0 down to beat Sevilla 3-2.

articles.author: MIKE STOBBE AP Medical Writer
articles.title: Mysterious liver illness seen in kids in US, Europe - KOMO News
articles.description: NEW YORK (AP) — Health officials in several countries are investigating mysterious cases of severe liver disease in children, and they think it may be related to a kind of virus usually associated with colds. The U. K. has been investigating at least 74…
